dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, net.limneos.libbulletin, com.spark.libsparkapplist, ws.hbang.common, org.thebigboss.wifiutil, libactivator

descriptionlist.description: SmartNetwork is divided into two parts. Once downloaded, you get a tweak for managing cellular data and WiFi networks + an app called WiFiList that displays all known connected networks and their password, with one click in the box you can easily share the password..
